adviseScripts.text: Tell me, my Lord. Which do you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Bitter spirits, or sweet?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Sweet!
Bitter!
So you are still partial to alcohol's sweet embrace?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: My Lord, you are but a novice still.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Never have truer words been spoken! Spirits are much like life itself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: One adjusts to life's ebb and flow much in the way you allow the bitterness of spirits to ease down your gullet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You possess a greater mind than your looks let on, my Lord!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Scarlet and share a drunken conversation.
My Lord, do you fancy the Outpost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I do.
No, I don't.
I see. So it is very much to my Lord's liking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Because this is my Lord's home.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If I may say so, I myself am not partial to this particular locale.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There is no sky, no moonlight, no wind here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It's all rather stuffy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about the Outpost.
My Lord, are you not taken with how Fleetly Fading
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: doth cleave through Raptures with such aplomb?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes, it's truly fascinating.
That's just what blades do.
As it very well should be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: As it stands, the Ark would never endorse the usage of such a dangerous method.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Much blood and many tears were shed in order to acquire this blade.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps the fact that these sacrifices have ceased
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: is what lies behind my Lord's fascination.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You are a strange bird indeed, my Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Most humans tend to be wary when faced with the unfamiliar.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yet the same cannot be said of you, my Lord. Most peculiar indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about Fleetly Fading.
What is my Lord's opinion on farming?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It would be a rewarding job.
Just hearing that word makes my body ache.
My thoughts exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: We give the land our labor, and the land provides us with sustenance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Certainly there is no reward more certain, more logical than this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Could this be due to my Lord never having been trained on a daily basis?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I must say, I expected my Lord to have a better appreciation of the philosophy behind tending the land.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The thought saddens me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about farming.
Snow White appears to be having have a hard time. She must scrounge for morsels to call a feast.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She would be wise to take some of that time spent dispatching Raptures
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: and instead devote it to farming, so that she does not starve.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you farm for her?
She doesn't need sympathy. This is the life she chose.
That, I cannot do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: We have agreed not to involve ourselves in each other's lives.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Living a life of starvation is what Snow White chose.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The moment we intervene,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: we are then meddling in her life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Therefore, I shan't ever do anything in her stead.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Precisely. Sympathy is for fools.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: This is the life that Snow White has chosen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have learned something from you today, my Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about Snow White.
I met Rapunzel at our regular meeting this month.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: She was practically drooling over you, my Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What has transpired between the two of you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have become a victim of her fantasy.
She and I are indulging in a pleasant fantasy.
Good heavens.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You have truly been put through the wringer, my Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: But alas, that is merely Rapunzel's way of showing affection.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes. Word of you becoming the subject of Rapunzel's fantasy has reached my ears.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Have you been enjoying it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: My Lord is certainly more... open-minded than I imagined.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about Rapunzel.
Tell me, my Lord, and be honest...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: are you positive you do not wish to spend your days on the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I've considered it, but I don't think I can.
I don't want to think about it.
I see. Very well, then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: My Lord has much to protect. I understand that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: That is one thing I admire about you, my Lord.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I eagerly await your return to the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Haha! You are most adamant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If that is the case, then I am afraid there is nothing much I can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: If however, you one day have a change of heart, do come and find me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I chat with Scarlet while thinking about life up on the surface.
Hic... well met, my Lord!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Fancy a drop or two?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Sure, I'll have a drink.
I think you've had enough for tonight.
Hic... excellent! As a good Lord should!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Looks like you know how to have a little fun after all!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Don't say that! I haven't drunk that much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: My Lord knows how to be a spoilsport, it seems.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a cheerful time with Scarlet.
Tell me, my Lord. What do you think goes best with spirits?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Moonlight and the wind?
Delicious food.
Precisely!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There is nothing greater than imbibing spirits while basking in nature.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I had you pegged for a tenderfoot, but I had you all wrong!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: A fine choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There's a surfeit of delicious morsels up on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: They and spirits make for fine bedfellows.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I chat with Scarlet about what goes best with alcohol.
Be honest with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Do you have a lady in your life?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes, a drunkard who wanders the surface.
No one in particular.
A drunkard who wanders the surface, you say...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Is it me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Haha! Oh, that makes me very happy, indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Very good! Today I will drink to celebrate the fact that
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: my Lord has chosen to make me his Lady!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I suppose you have no intention of telling me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I was hoping this could be our topic of discussion while we drank.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What a pity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I drink with Scarlet while we share a casual conversation.
When ye have imbibed one's fair share of spirits, what typically proceeds?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I go to sleep.
I end up crying my eyes out.
A most ordinary response.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes, surely a desirable habit to have in one's company.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I must ask ye, what dost thou imagine mine habits are whilst in a state of inebriation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Spirits do reveal the emotions trapped inside us all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Allowing the tears to flow when one must is paramount.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Should one keep it bottled up for too long, ye might manifest stomach ulcers and the like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shan't be the most proficient in comforting those in need,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: but I am a most capable drinking companion, so do reach out to me when the time is right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I have a conversation about drinking habits.
Snow White inquired unto me what I find so enchanting about drinking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Tell me, my good fellow, why do you drink?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I like the taste.
To get drunk.
Indeed, spirits are a most intoxicating elixir.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It is most upsetting that others of the female persuasion shan't appreciate its flavor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: To that end, I brought some of the finest spirits with me. Would you perchance care to have a nip?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: To imbibe simply to be three sheets to the wind is a rather trying experience on one's body.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There are as many flavors of spirit as there are stars in the sky, and you can have your pick of the lot.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: However, one must take care not to overdo it, as inebriation must not be one's end goal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: With that being said, why don't we have a drink?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I had a conversation about different flavors of alcohol.
To drink inquietude is most pleasurable,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: but to drink in revelry, accompanied by music, can be quite alluring as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: When ye takes to the bottle, what music dost thou prefer to listen to?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Jazz music, to help set the mood.
Folk music that has a good feel to it.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps not in alignment with mine own preference, but thou doth piqued mine interest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Let our ears take in the dulcet tones of jazz next time we indulge in the spirits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: So you also are one for folk music!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Let us indulge in spirits under the moonlight, all accompanied by the dulcet tones of folk melodies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shall bring the finest spirits that suit the music.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I talk about what type of music goes well with alcohol.
I must say, the weather up on the surface has been most inclement.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What say ye to imbibing the spirits on a rainy day?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I think it's perfectly acceptable to drink on a rainy day.
I personally think it's better to drink on a sunny day.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Indeed, to enjoy the bottle amidst the rainfall is an experience like no other. Poetic, emotional...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: However, as mine eyes shan't chance upon the light of the moon, I do not prefer it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It is as I thought. You and I are peas in a pod, my good fellow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: To drink on a clear day is ideal, as only then can one capture the moonlight in one's glass.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The moonlight and a gentle breeze are perfect bedfellows for a fine glass of spirits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I talk about what we think is the perfect drinking weather.
If perchance one day we doth succeed in reclaiming the surface, what shall ye do with the days that remain?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I'd be content living a quiet life on my own patch of land.
I'd want to spend it with the friends that are closest to me.
A fine notion indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Up until now, thy life has been one full of strife and fractiousness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The day will come when we can bask in the light of the sun, and the moon alike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Ye will live a life much different than mine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: As it stands, the surface is a land of great strife and disarray.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: When this all comes to an end, mine greatest desire is to live a quiet life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I dreamt about the future.
My good fellow, what are your views on romance?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Given the sad state of our world, is it something we must have?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Or does it not have a place in the world as it is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: As soon as you start overanalyzing it, any romance ceases to exist.
I think you could make a case for both.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I cannot deny the truth in your words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: The moment one begins to ponder such matters, they are drained of any semblance of romance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Well then, let us drink to romance on this day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Haha, you would not perchance be reticent on siding with either argument, would you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: In an ideal world, perhaps you could get by with such a vague answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It is, however, not suitable for a world in which thy life is constantly in peril.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I debate the meaning of romance.
My good fellow, what say ye about
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: drinking until one loses one's faculties?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: When someone drinks to excess, there is always a reason behind it.
To me, that's allowing alcohol to consume you.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I dare not attempt to presume what others are going through,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: but when one begins to depend on the spirits, it is most undesirable. Thy memory goes blank, despite there being no vicissitudes in the outside world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Our minds are one with this issue.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I am the one consuming the alcohol, not the other way around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: So, let us raise our glasses and drink. Ye and I shall be the ones in command of the bottle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I enjoyed a drink.
Many lives are at play in the realm of agriculture.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I smite the pests that afflict my crops. I drive out or slay the beasts that roam my fields.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There are those to whom farming is but a puritanical pursuit, one which the stench of death does not penetrate. They are mistaken.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Tell me, my good fellow,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: What says ye about achieving something from the sacrifice of something else?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: There must be another way.
Sacrifice is inevitable.
Aye, should I be thee, I would feel the same.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: But I myself believe nothing can be accomplished without sacrifice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I hope that one day ye shall come to this realization as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: It is truly so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Aye, I feel the same as thee, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: it is not an answer that warms the cockles of mine heart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet teaches me about various farming methods.
Perchance this is a foolish inquiry, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: hath ye ever felt as if thine and another were intertwined in some way?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I have.
No, I haven't.
Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: That is why I have felt a connection with you from the very beginning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: We must partake in the bottle the next time we meet.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: To live such a life, would be freedom incarnate.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Scarlet and I have a conversation about fate.
My good fellow,
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: up on the surface, flowers bloom as far as the eye can see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: Would ye perchance express any interest in gazing upon them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You go on ahead. I'll follow you.
I have other things I have to take care of.
Very well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shall find the perfect place, and await your arrival.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: You shall have a glass of spirits awaiting you, do not keep it waiting long!
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: By the heavens...
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: ye have but nary a shrivel of appreciation for sentimentality.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I shan't say whether such a thing is unfortunate, or merely pitiable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Scarlet

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Scarlet about going to see the flowers.
